title: Uncle Si's Last Dance with Mary Jane
description:
Si Robertson is no flower child ... or is he? Martin makes fun of John-David's pitiful Tom Petty knowledge, Si is a huge fan of "American Idol," and Godwin will wreck his truck air drumming to Rush. The boys debate the flat Earth theory and whether Taylor Swift ruined country music. John-David asks listeners to flood the Buc-ee's email to get one opened in West Monroe. Si is full of bull (stories). And Martin drops some major wisdom about temptation and managing your finances.
-
